name: Smartphone
description: A transformative triple‑camera system that adds tons of capability without complexity. An unprecedented leap in battery life. And a mind‑blowing chip that doubles down on machine learning and pushes the boundaries of what a smartphone can do. Welcome to the first iPhone powerful enough to be called Pro.

reviews.name: Yuri
reviews.description: Very good product. Attends all my needs and easily replaced my camera. I am not a professional photographer, so it attends perfectly for what I need. I recommend 100%.

reviews.name: Stephanie
reviews.description: Is a really good iPhone. Is good for watching videos. Has an amazing camera quality. Is good for scrolling on social media. Does the job when texting and phone calls.
